body: So....as someone who never played any of the Arc the Lad games, is this pairing canon or just something the doujinshi artist came up with?
oh look the only one that isnt trash out of all the parodies of ard the lad.
Finally translated... demn hail tokyo good contents
As an Arc the Lad fan, this is super hot. Seeing Elc and Lieza get together as a couple is perfect.

I yelled YEESSSSS when I see this and thought IT'S A SEQUEL WHEN SHE BECAME A PROSTITUTE but a tad bit sad when I find out that this isn't the sequel. In spite of all those unimportant circumstances, I clicked it and FUCK IT, I DON'T KNOW WHO THE FUCK THAT ELC GUY IS BUT SHIT YOUR WIFE IS AMAZING DUDE DAMN THAT'S SOME GOOD SHIT!
God i remember playing this game when im 12 with my brother
The cosmos always informs me when there's some big tiddies that need to be fapped to.
Holy damn those tiddies, that was instant click the second I saw the thumbnail.
